name: WebJudge Evaluator (Green Agent)
description: An A2A Green Agent that evaluates web agents using the 3-step WebJudge methodology. This agent hosts an assessment and reports a binary success/failure status.

expected_inputs.task_id: The ID of the Online-Mind2Web task to load (e.g., 'om2w_task_001').
expected_inputs.participant_url: The base URL of the A2A-compliant white agent to be tested.
